path.style: fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(0, 114, 255); stroke-width: 50px;
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(0, 114, 255); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 50px;
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(0, 114, 255); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 50px;
